title: Lesson 3: Sanctification & Growth
description: How God progressively conforms us to the image of Christ.

blocks.text: Sanctification is the lifelong process of becoming more like Jesus. It requires patience and grace, as God works slowly but surely to transform our desires, thoughts, and actions.
And I am sure of this, that he who began a good work in you will bring it to completion at the day of Jesus Christ.
2.1 - Looking back over the past year, in what specific way has God changed or grown your character?
